{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cystocele, enterocele, and urethral descent are conditions that occur due to weakening of the pelvic floor muscles. The pubococcygeus is a part of the levator ani group of muscles, which forms the majority of the pelvic floor. Therefore, injury to the pubococcygeus muscle can lead to these conditions.", "answer_choice": "A. Pubococcygeus"}
